column1: The Neptune-Revenge area has had a long history of gold exploration and production.
· 1984: Discovery of Revenge - Magnetic anomaly within favourable stratigraphy
· 1994: Resource definition of supergene ore bodies Mars, Agamemnon, and Minotaur
2004-Current: Discovery of the Neptune palaeochannel deposit, including A5 and Redback. Mining has been undertaken into fresh rock
